body:
Notes:
- since petsc and petsc4py tarballs are now spun together and hosted together - I've changed the download URL for petsc4py [copied over the older version tarballs to this location]
- petsc changed the role of petsc.tar.gz vs petsc-lite.tar.gz - so updated accordingly.

cc: @dalcinl @joseeroman @s-sajid-ali
title: petsc@3.15.0, py-petsc4py@3.15.0
